text: Table 3 Definition of hypertension in adults [12]. Category Systolic blood pressure Diastolic blood pressure Normal <120 mmHg and < 80 mmHg Elevated 120-129 mmHg and < 80 mmHg Hypertension Stage 1 130-139 mmHg or 80-89 mmHg Stage 2 > 140 mmHg or > 90 mmHg An individual with systolic blood pressure and diastolic blood pressure in two different categories should be assigned to the higher category.
